properties.title: Capanna Basodino (Robiei) CAS
properties.abstract:
Chiens non admis dans les dortoirs. Paiement en Euro possible
Chiens non admis dans les dortoirs. Paiement en Euro possible
properties.description: The SAC mountain hostel on the verge of the Robièi landscape with the many lakes offers a spectacular view deep down to Val Bavona and across the glacier up to Basòdino. The cabin is easily accessible by the aerial cableway from San Carlo and thus an ideal place for families. Visitors hike around the lakes, ascend summits and cross Passo di Cristallina to Val Bedretto and towards Airolo.
